text: The Sarthe is a river in western France. It is 313.9 km long. Together with the river Mayenne it forms the river Maine, which is a tributary to the river Loire. It flows through the departments Orne, Sarthe and Maine-et-Loire. Category:Rivers of Normandy Category:Rivers of Pays de la Loire Category:Maine-et-Loire Category:Orne Category:Sarthe
title: Sarthe (river)
